class.name: kr_trackers/LineTrackerMinJerk
class.description: This is a tracker which follows a line from the current position to a given goal position using min jerk trajectory.

class.name: kr_trackers/LineTrackerDistance
class.description: This is a tracker which follows a line from the current position to a given goal position using a trapezoidal trajectory with distance along the trajectory as the parameter instead of time.

class.name: kr_trackers/VelocityTracker
class.description: This tracker commands a desired velocity for the robot.

class.name: kr_trackers/SmoothVelTracker
class.description: This tracker goes from point A to point B trying to maintain constant velocity with a smooth ramp up.

class.name: kr_trackers/CircleTracker
class.description: This tracker commands the robot to fly in a circle of a given size and period.

class.name: kr_trackers/TrajectoryTracker
class.description: This tracker commands the robot to follow a smooth trajectory passing through multiple waypoints.

class.name: kr_trackers/LissajousAdder
class.description: Follows a sum of two Lissajous trajectories
